author: Howard Boyle
description: Efficient way of distributing Aid to households and educating the families. Ebola information can be stowed in the cardboard tube center of a toilet paper roll. Ebola Collateral can be placed inside with the temperature strips.The toilet paper can be given out to populations affected by Ebola.
summary: Efficient way of distributing Aid to households and educating the families. Ebola information can be stowed in the cardboard tube center of a toilet paper roll. Ebola Collateral can also be placed inside tube with the temperature strips.
title: Efficient way of distributing Aid to households and educating the families. Ebola information can be stowed in the cardboard tube center of a toilet paper roll. Ebola Collateral can also be placed inside tube with the temperature strips.
